item.description: Atomic Habits by Clear, James Metadata Author: [[Clear, James]] Full Title: Atomic Habits Category: #books Highlights ==changes that seem small and unimportant at first will compound into remarkable results if you’re willing to stick with them for years.

How to Take Smart Notes: One Simple Technique to Boost Writing, Learning and Thinking – for Students, Academics and… by Ahrens, Sönke Metadata Author: [[Ahrens, Sönke]] Full Title: How to Take Smart Notes: One Simple Technique to Boost Writing, Learning and Thinking – for Students, Academics and Nonfiction Book Writers Category: #books Highlights ==Writing plays such a central role in learning, studying and research that it is surprising how little we think about it.

How to Win Friends and Influence People by Carnegie, Dale Metadata Author: [[Carnegie, Dale]] Full Title: How to Win Friends and Influence People Category: #books Highlights ==Only knowledge that is used sticks in your mind.

Planting by Piet Oudolf and Noel Kingsbury Metadata Author: [[Piet Oudolf and Noel Kingsbury]] Full Title: Planting Category: #books Highlights PLANTING – THE BIG PICTURE GROUPING PLANTS ==The discipline needed to restrict the numbers of varieties necessary for matrix mixes to work is perhaps too tight for many locations, where a wide variety of plants are needed to engage the onlooker==
